name: Recruits (itch)
description:
Drag and drop the soldier pieces that you earn in game in order to craft the most powerful squad. Arrange your group of soldiers on the field so that it cannot be pushed through. Don't let the enemies touch you or stay in your base too long. Hold TAB when hovering over soldier pieces to have a look at some STATS

                                                                                                                                                        

18 total ranks for squad units 13 total outfits for customization 9 total weapons for whatever damage output you'd like

                                                                                                                                                        

ps:

might have to be patient with clicking the units, they don't always want to get selected

if you have trouble with starting the game, drag the body parts together in the middle. I don't think anyone will have trouble with this though

all assets that aren't created by me, are freely available to anybody

made in 7 days for the JamCraft #4 Game Jam
